trans-unit.source: "Accessible Books" are books that work well for people with impaired vision. With the ePUB format*, it is possible to make "Born Accessible" books that work well for everyone**, regardless of vision. Bloom has the following tools to help you create these books:
trans-unit.note: The * and ** are footnote markers that should remain the same.
trans-unit.target: “Wuj ya'tal okem ” "are taq wuj b’anom chi kech ri winaq k’o ne jun k’ax pa kib’aq’wach. Ruk’ ri q’in ePUB* kb’an ne kowinem chech ri ub’anik ri wuj “Ya'tal okem are taq xtik uloq" kchakun chi kech konojel**, Jas ne ri k’ax chech ri ub’aqwach. Bloom k’o ri chakub’al chech ato’ik ub’anik we wuj ri’:

alt-trans.target: “Wuj chi kech k’ax b’aq’wachaj” "are taq wuj b’anom chi kech ri winaq k’o ne jun k’ax pa kib’aq’wach. Ruk’ ri q’in ePUB* kb’an ne kowinem che ri ub’anik ri wuj “Ya’talik are chi’ xtik loq" kchakun chi kech konojel**, Su ne lo ri k’ax che ri ub’aqwach. Bloom k’o ri chakub’al rech che ato’ik ub’anik we wuj ri’:

trans-unit.source: This tool, the Accessibility Checker, has:
trans-unit.target: We chakub’al, "Ilonel rech ya'tal okib'al", k'o rech:

alt-trans.target: We chakub’al, "Ilonel rech ri okib’al", Ko rech

trans-unit.source: The "Accessibility Checklist" which is where Bloom checks over your book and points you to anything that needs attention, especially for speakers of minority languages.
trans-unit.target: Ri "Chol ilonik rech okib’al” chila’ pa wi ri Bloom kunik’oj jas ri awuj xuquje’ kk’utu ronojel ri sutaq kraj rilik, pacha’ ne ri winaq kech’aw pa ri tzijob’al man e k’i taj.

alt-trans.target: Ri "Chol re ilonik rech okib’al” chila’ pa wi ri Bloom kunik’oj su ri awuj xuquje’ kk’utu ronojel ri sutaq kraj rilik, pacha’ ri winaq kech’aw pa ri tzijob’al ma e k’i taj.

trans-unit.source: The "Ace by DAISY Checker" searches the actual ePUB generated by Bloom looking for any problems.
trans-unit.target: Ri ilonel "Ace by Daisy Checker" kunik’oj ri k’olib’al ePUB ya’om rumal Bloom chech utzukuxik ri k’i taq k’axk'olil.

alt-trans.target: Ri ilonel rech "Ace by Daisy Checker" kunik’oj ri k’olib’al ePUB ya’om rumal Bloom che utzukuxik ri k’i taq k’eyowal.

trans-unit.source: While the ideal is that a single book can serve everyone, the ePUB standard and ePUB readers do not actually support that. They currently only work for blind people who speak a language that is supported by "Text to Speech" (TTS) systems. At this time, TTS is only available for large or commercially interesting languages. Until the standard and accessible readers improve, it is necessary to make special versions of accessible books for minority language speakers. For blind readers to hear the image descriptions, we need to put something special on the page. In this version of Bloom, you do this by clicking the "Include image descriptions on page" checkbox in the Publish:ePUB screen. Future versions may have other options in this area.
trans-unit.target: Ri kurajawaj qak'u'x are k’ut uwokik jun no’jwuj kub’ana upatan chi kech konojel. Man kb’antaj ta kowinem ruk' q’in ePUB xuquje’ ri sik’il taq rech ePUB xa rumal xuwi kchakun chi kech ri winaq man keka’y taj xuwi ri kech’aw pa jun tzijob’al k’o tob’anik chi kech pa kematal chak "Text to Speech" (TTS) te'qne "Woktz’ib’ ruk’ ch’ab’alil". Kamik ri’, ri TTS xuwi ya'tal chi kech nik’aj taq tzijob’al k’i uwinaqil kekojowik. Kab'an na rutzil ri q’in xuquje’ ri sik’ib’al ePUB rech kuya'o kokisax pa taq Wuj ya'tal okib'al chi kech ri winaq kech’aw pa ri tzijob’al chi man e k’i taj. Chi kech ri winaq ri man keka'y taj rech kkita le kab'ix para uwi' ub'antajik taq le wachib'al rajawaxik kqanim na jun such pa ri uxaq wuj. Chi upam we jun ub’antajik Bloom, kb’an kowinem chech ruk’ ub’anik pitz’ pa uwi’ ri k’olib’al "Ukojik uya’ik ri kkb’ij ri wachib’al chi upam ri uxaq wuj" pa ri wok ilb’al wachaj Tzijob’exik:ePUB. Chwe’q kb’ij kb’an chi nik’aj pa koksax chi na nik’aj taq okib’al chik chech we uqajib’al ri upam.

alt-trans.target: Ri jun no’j are k’ut uwokik jun no’jwuj kub’ana upatan chi kech konojel. Ma kb’antaj ta kwinem che, ruk’ ri q’in ePUB xuquje’ ri sik’il taq rech ePUB. Xuw b’a’ kchakun chi kech ri winaq ma keka’y taj xuw kech’aw pa jun tzijob’al k’o tob’anik chi kech rumal ri kematal chak "Text to Speech" (TTS) o "Woktz’ib’ ruk’ ch’ab’alil". Kamik ri’, chi upam ri TTS xuw k’olik chi kech nik’aj taq tzijob’al k’i uwinaqil kech’aw chi upam ri tzijob’al. Ke’utzir na ri q’in xuquje’ ri sik’ib’al ePUB xk’ex suk’umax na, rajawaxik uwokik nik’aj taq wuj chik okib’al chi kech ri winaq kech’aw pa ri tzijob’al che ma e k’i taj. Rech ri sik’in taq ma keka’y taj kekwinik kkito ri kb’ixik pa uwi’ ub’antajik ri wachib’al, kqanim na jun such pa ri uxaq wuj. Chi upam we jun ri ub’antajik Bloom, kb’an kwinem che ruk’ ub’anik pitz’ pa uwi’ ri k’olib’al "Ukojik uya’ik ri kkb’ij ri wachib’al chi upam ri uxaq wuj" pa ri wok ilb’al wachaj Tzijob’exik:ePUB. Chwe’q kb’ij kb’an chik nik’aj pa koksax chi na nik’aj taq okib’al chik che we uqajib’al ri upam.

alt-trans.target: Ri k’ak’nel rech ri wokchakub’al kuk’ak’lej ri k'i taq k’ak’saxik ri Bloom chi upam we kematz’ib’.

trans-unit.source: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and it will attempt to open a browser to show the Bloom Library
trans-unit.target: Utzukuxik k’i Kemuxe' No’jwuj pa BloomLibrary.org

alt-trans.target: Utzukuxik k’i No’j wuj Tz’ib’ pa BloomLibrary.org
Utzukuxik k’i No’jwuj Tz’ib’ pa BloomLibrary.org

trans-unit.source: Note: The Bloom Library contains shell books, whereas your current collection is a "source collection", meaning it is for making shell books, not for translating them into the local language.
trans-unit.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection
trans-unit.target: Ub’ixikil: Le Uk'olib'al no'jwuj Bloom k’o chi upam jalajoj taq No'jwuj wokotal chik, xa are k’ut chi ronojel xa jun “Wokcha'tal Kemuxe' No’jwuj”, xa rech uwokik no'jwuj wokotal chik, man xa ta rech kaq’axax pa jun ajwaral tzijob’al.

alt-trans.target: Ub’ixkil: Ri K’ol no’jwuj Bloom k’o chi upam no’jwuj b’anom chik uloq, xa k’ut jun kamik ri’ “Uwach ri No’jwuj Fuente”, xa rech uwokik No’jwuj b’anom chik uloq, ma xat rech kaq’axax pa jun waral tzijob’al.

trans-unit.source: When you've made a shell, you can then upload it to the Bloom Library from the Publish tab.
trans-unit.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection
trans-unit.target: Are taq xwokotaj jun No'jwuj wokotal chik, katkowinik kapaqab'a' pa ri Uk'olib'al no'jwuj Bloom pa le k’utjaqb’al “Tzijob’exik”.

alt-trans.target: Are taq xwokotaj jun No'jwuj wokotal chik, katkowinik kaya pa ri Uk'olib'al no'jwuj Bloom chi k’utjaqb’al “Tzijob’exik”.
Are chi’ xwok jun No’jwuj B’anom chik uloq katkowinik kaya pa ri K’olno’l wuj Bloom chi k’utjaqb’al “Tzijob’exik”.

trans-unit.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection

trans-unit.source: Bloom will now open this HTML document in your word processing program (normally Word or LibreOffice). You will be able to work with the text and images of this book. These programs normally don't do well with preserving the layout, so don't expect much.
trans-unit.target: Bloom kutor na we uwujil HTML pa ri kematal chak rech ri chakunel rech woktzij (amag'el are Word o LibreOffice). Katkowin na kab'an unik’ojisaxik ri woktzij xuquje’ ri wachib’al rech we no’jwuj ri'. Wa' we kematal chak k’o karaj man kuk’ol ta ri uwokob’axik uxaq wuj, man kakub’i’ ta ak’u’x chi rij.

alt-trans.target: Bloom kutor na we wuj HTML pa ri ukemchak rech ri chakunel rech woktz’ib’ (normalmente Word o LibreOffice). Lal kakowin na la che unik’ojisaxik ri wok tz’ib’ xuquje’ ri wachib’al rech we no’jwuj. We kemchak k’o karaj ma kuk’ol taj ri wokob’al rech ri uxaq wuj, ma kakub’i’ ta ak’u’x chi rij.

trans-unit.target: Utaqik pa Word te'qne pa LibreOffice...

trans-unit.source: This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.

alt-trans.target: We k’i taq uwach wuj q’atum uwach, man loq’ taj kya’ uwi’ o kchup k’ak’ taq wuj.

trans-unit.target: Utorik k'olyakb'al chak chi upam ri setk'olib'al

trans-unit.source: Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.
trans-unit.target: Rumal chi are we jun wokcha'tal kemuxe' no’jwuj, Bloom man katajin ta kutzuj No'jwuj wokotal chik ri e k'o pacha kemuxe' rech k'ak' taq No'jwuj wokotal chik. We kawaj kawiq jun tzijob'al chik chech jun No'jwuj wokotal chik, rajawaxik kab'an k'ak' utz'ib'axik le wokcha'talik no'jwuj ri k'o wi ri no'jwuj wokotal chik, chi uk'axwach jun uwachib'al. Le cholb'al q'ij ma kokisax ta chech uwokik jun k'ak' no'jwuj wokotal chik.

alt-trans.target: Rumal chech are jun k'i taq uwach ri no'jwuj fuente, Bloom ma tajan ta kusuj no'jwuj b'anom chi uloq e k'olik pacha' fuentes chi kech k'ak' taq no'jwuj. We kawaj uya'ik uwi' jun tzijob'al che jun no'jwuj b'anom chi uloq, rajawaxik ukolomaxik k'i taq uwach no'jwuj che k'o chik chi upam ri no'jwuj b'anom chi uloq, chi uk'axwach jun wachib'al. Ri cholq'ij ma koksax ta chech uwokik jun k'ak' No'jwuj B'anom chi uloq.

trans-unit.source: Bloom downloaded the book but had problems making it available in Bloom. Please restart your computer and try again. If you get this message again, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom developers
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, period at end): Bloom downloaded the book but had problems making it available in Bloom. Please restart your computer and try again. If you get this message again, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom developers.
trans-unit.target: Bloom xuqajisaj ri wuj, xa k’ut man xkowin ta chech uya’ik jamalik uwach pa Bloom. Chb’ana toqob’, chatzija chi jumul chik ri akematz’ib’ xuquje’ chab’ana jumul chik. We kwil chi jumul we jun oqxa’n ri', chb’ana toq’ob’ chb’ana pitz' pa uwi’ ri “Detalles” xuquje’ chya ub’ixik ri k’axk'olil chi kech ri ajkemal taq chak rech Bloom

alt-trans.target: Bloom xuqasaj ri wuj, xa k’ut ma xkowin ta che uya’ik jamalik uwach pa ri Bloom. Chb’ana toqob’, chamajij jumul chik ri akematz’ib’ xuquje’ chab’ana jumul chik. We kk’am we jun oqxa’n jun mul chik, chb’ana toq’ob’ chb’ana pitz' pa uwi’ ri “Detalles” xuquje’ chya ub’ixik ri k’ayowal chi kech ri kemonelab’ rech Bloom

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading the book. You can try again at a different time, or write to us at issues@bloomlibrary.org if you cannot get the download to work from your location.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9): There was a problem downloading your book.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.

trans-unit.source: When you make a book from a shell, use this box to tell who did the translation.

trans-unit.source:
The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
• Fuzziness and grey dots.
• Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
• If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:
trans-unit.target:
Le k'olchak xcha'ik are jun k'olchak "JPEG". Le k'oltaq chak JPEG sib'alaj utz chi kech le wachib'al te'qne le wiqtaq wachib'al e q'o'talik. Xa are kuya k'ax chech taq le je'l taq ub'anik juch' chi q'eqsaq. Le k'axk'olil rachi'l taq:
• Moymotem xuquje' sal taq nak'.
• Nima'q k'oltaq chak, ri kuya k'ax chech ujachik le no'jwuj.
• We k'o sib'alaj taq k'olchak JPEG sib'alaj nim upam, kraj ne Bloom man k'o ta nim upam chech ub'anik PDFs.

 Ub'ixikil: Rumal le q'in rech JPEG kuya "tzaq", uk'exik jun k'olchak JPEG pa PNG, TIFF te'qne BMP kanimtaj le k'axk'olil. We le k'olchak are jun je'lb'anoj juch' chi q'eqsaq, rajawaxik uk'amik jun uq'axexik wachib'al le qas uxe'al pa we jun taq q'in ri'.

 Chab'ana jun toq'ob' chcha' jun chi kech taq we q'in ri' k'ate k'u ri' chb'ana pitz' pa "Uk'ulaxik":

alt-trans.target:
Ri k'olchak xcha'xik are jun k'olchak "JPEG". Ri k'i taq k'olchak JPEG sib'alaj utz chi kech ri k'i taq wachaj xuquje' jalajoj taq tz'aj wachib'al keka'yik. Wa we ri', ya'l k'ex chi rech ri je'l saq juch' xuquje' q'eq. Ri k'i taq k'axk'olil k'o chi upam:
• Borrosidad y puntos grises.
• K'i nima'q taq k'olchak, rumal wa' k'ax ujachik ri no'jwuj .
• We k'o sib'alaj taq k'olchak JPEG sib'alaj nim, kaj ne Bloom ma k'o ta nim upam che ub'anik PDFs.

 Ub'ixkil: Rumal ri q'in JPEG kuya "tzaq", uk'exik jun k'olchak JPEG a PNG, TIFF o BMP kanimtaj ri sutaq. We ri k'olchak are jun je'l juch' saq xuquje' q'eq, rajawaxik uk'amik jun uq'axexik wachib'al qas are' chi upam ri k'i taq q'in.

 Chab'ana jun toq'ob' chcha' jun chi kech we ri' xuquje' anaqil chb'ana pitz' pa "Uk'amik":

trans-unit.source: Motion Books are Bloom Reader books with two modes. Normally, they are Talking Books. When you turn the phone sideways, the picture fills the screen. It pans and zooms from rectangle "1" to rectangle "2".
trans-unit.target: No'jwuj ruk' silob'em e no'jwuj rech Bloom Reader ruk' keb' taq ub'anik. chi konojel e ta'omno'wuj. Are taq ksutin ri k'olwiqkem chakub'al te'qne le ch'awab'al, le wachib'al kunojisaj ri k'utb'al wach. Ksolob' pa rab'arik kajxukut "1"xuquje' karilij le rab'arik kajxukut "2".

alt-trans.target: No'jwuj ruk' silob'em e no'jwuj rech Bloom Reader ruk' keb' taq ub'anik. Xas je wi e toyno'wuj.Are chi' ksutin ri k'olwiq kem chakub'al o ri oyonib'al, ri wachib'al kunojisaj ri woilb'al wachaj. Ksolob' chi rech nim kajxukut "1"xuquje'rilik pa ri nim kajxukut "2"

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
trans-unit.target: Bloom man kakowin ta chech uk'utik we no'jwuj ri'. Te'qne' kub'ij chi xtzaq ri achak xuquje' kub'ij chi k'o jastaq ri man k'ak'arisam taj, karaj na te'qne' xub'an k'ax.

alt-trans.target: Bloom ma kakowin taj kuk'ut we no'jwuj. Wa' ma kcha taj che xa xtzaq ri achak, xa k'ut kub'ij che k'o ri ma k'ak'asam ta che, k'o karaj na o xa k'o xq'axq'ob'ik.

trans-unit.note: displays as a "toast", {0} is the URL/filename
trans-unit.target: Man loq' taj kab'an okem pa {0}

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, then ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed, which may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, shorter wording): Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom man xkowin ta chech umajik ri HTTP Listener, kojom chech ri ch'awem ruk' ri tzukunel uk'amom rib rech Firefox. We jeri' kak'ulmatajik man xa ta ne rumal k'ate xk'aka'risax jumul chik le kematz'ib', rajawaxik kata chech jun chik kunik'oj we jeqeb'am jun k'ayij ub'i' ch'u'j ramq'aq' (Cortafuegos agresivo). Karaj ne rajawaxik resaxik ri ramq'aq' rech kb'an kowinem chech ukojik Bloom.

alt-trans.target: Bloom ma xkowin taj umajik ri rech HTTP Listener, kojom che ri ch'awem ruk ri tzukunel uk'amom rib rech Firefox. We jeri' kak'ulmatajik ma xat ne rumal k'ate kmajataj chi kamul ri akematz'ib', rajawaxik kata che jun chik kunik'oj we qab'am jun k'ayij rech ch'u'j ramq'aq'. Kaj ne rajawaxik resaxik ri ramq'aq' rech kb'an kowinem che ukojik Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had trouble saving a page. Please click Details below and report this to us. Then quit Bloom, run it again, and check to see if the page you just edited is missing anything. Sorry!
trans-unit.target: Bloom xuriq k'axk'olil are taq katajin kuk'ol ri uxaq. Chab'ana jun toq'ob', chab'ana pitz' pa "Detalles" k'o chi uxe' xuquje' chab'ij uloq chi qech. K'ate k'u ri' chatz'apij Bloom, chak'ak'arisaj jumul chik xuquje' chanik'oj uwach wene le uxaq le k'ate' xa kolomisaj k'o kraj na chech. ¡Chakuyu qamak!

alt-trans.target: Bloom xuraq q'atuj are chi' tajan kuk'ol ri uxaq. Toq'ob', chbana pitz' pa "Detalles" chi uxe' xuquje' chab'ij chi qech. K'a te k'u ri' ta'zpij Bloom, chmaja chi jumul chik xuquje' chnik'oj uwach we che ri uxaq k'ate' xa kolomisaj lr k'o kraj na che. ¡Kuyu qamak!

trans-unit.note: The placeholder {0} represents the current version of Bloom. For example, {0} might be replaced with "4.3"

alt-trans.target: Lal tajan kchakuj la ri Bloom {0}

trans-unit.source: This might be caused by Windows Defender "Controlled Folder Access" or some other virus protection.
trans-unit.note: After an October 2017 windows update, this appears when Bloom opens a collection and tries to write out the collection settings.
trans-unit.target: We k'ulmatajem ri' are kab'anow le Windows Defender "Okib'al chajim pa k'olyakb'al chak" (Controlled Folder Access) te'qne' rumal jun kematal chak rech uq'atel uchikopil.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Bloom man kakowin taj kumaj suk' uchak. Wa' we retal k'ulmatajem iltajinaq pa taq kematz'ib' ruk' ZoneAlarm jeqeb'am. Ub'ixikil: Chupuk'asuxik ZoneAlarm man kusol ta rij we k'axk'olil ri'. K'ak'umajik le kematal chak ruk' ZoneAlarm chupinaq xuquje' man kusol ta rij le k'axk'olil. Rech kasolotaj uwach le k'axk'olil rajawaxik resaxik ri ZoneAlarm.

alt-trans.target: Bloom ma kakowin taj kumaj suk'. Wa we retal kak'ulmatajik iltajinak pa taq kematz'ib' ruk' ZoneAlarm jeqab'am. Ub'ixik: Desactivar ZoneAlarm ma kusol ta rij we k'axk'olil. K'ak' umajik ri kem tal chak ruk' ZoneAlarm chupnaq xuquje' ma solta rij ri k'axk'olil. Rech usolik rajawaxik resaxik ri ZoneAlarm.

trans-unit.source: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
trans-unit.target: BloomPDFMaker.exe, jun uch'aqapil rech Bloom, pacha' ub'ik man k'o taj. Wa' we ri' kuq'atuj ri uxe' rilb'alil xuquje' tz'ajtz'ib'anem. Le kematal taq chak rech ri uq'atel uchikopil te'qne' are keb'anow wa'. Kuya'o kata to'b'anik chi kech le nim keta'amb'al para pa uwi' taq le ub'anik rutzil le ujeqeb'axik le Bloom xuquje' rech uto'ik uwi' we k'olchak ri' we xchup jumul chik.

alt-trans.target: BloomPDFMaker.exe, jun ch'aqab' rech Bloom, pacha' b'i ma k'o taj. Wa we ri' kuq'atuj ri ilb'al rech nab'e xuquje' tz'ajtz'ib'anem. Ri nuk'uwach chak rech ri q'atchikop kekowinik kkib'an wa'. Katk'owinik katoq'ij to'b'anik pa uwi' taq wa' keta'm rech le ub'anik rutzil ri ujeqab'axik ri Bloom xuquje' uto'ik uwi' we k'olchak rech ub'anaik jumul chik uchupik.

trans-unit.source: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make local language books with your shells.
trans-unit.target: Jun wokcha'tal no'jwuj wokotal chik te'qne' rech raqanib'al pa jun wene pa k'i nima'q taq tzijob'al kokisax chech ri tzijonem. Katkowinik kapaqab'a' we no'jwuj wokotal chik pa BloomLibrary.org. Xuquje' katkowinik kawok jun Woktanaj rech Bloom rech ula'nik kuk' jule' chik rech kakiwok no'jwuj pa ri ajwaral kitzijob'al ruk' taq le no'jwuj wokotal chik chi kawok na.

alt-trans.target: Jun k'i uwach no'jwuj b'anom chik uloq o rech raqanib'al pa jun o k'i taq nima'q tzijob'al koksaxik che ri tzijonem. Katkowinik kapaqab'a' we k'i taq no'jwuj b'anom chik uloq a BloomLibrary.org. Xuquje' katkowinik kawok jun Tanaj rech Bloom rech ujachik kuk' nik'aj chik rech kekowinik kkiwok no'jwuj pa ri waral kitzijob'al kuk' ri k'i taq no'jwuj b'anom chik uloq che kewokona la.
K'i taq uwach ri waral tzijob'al

trans-unit.source: In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
trans-unit.target: Ruk' ri rayb'al che uk'olem ronojel ma k'ex taj xuquje' ujeqalik, Bloom uk'olom ronpjel taq ri k'i taq no'jwuj che ri lal kwok la pa jun o k'i <i>Colecciones</ i>. Ri nab'e rajawaxik kqab'ano are uwokik jun ucha'ik uwach chech la.
Chab'ana pitz' pa 'Jun chik' rech umajik.

trans-unit.source: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom xrilo chi we wokcha'talik ri' kriqitaj pa jun k'olchak rech Dropbox. Wa' k'o kuya k'axk'olil xa rumal k'o karaj Dropbox kuq'atej Bloom ruk' taq ri uk'olchak. We k'o k'axk'olil, kkoqxa'nij chi solob'isax pa jun wokcha'talik para jun k'olib'al chik te'qne' pa utoq'ob'axik Dropbox rech kab'an ukojik aq'anoq Bloom.

alt-trans.target: Bloom xrilo che wa' we ucha'ik uwach kraqataj pa jun k'olchak rech Dropbox. Wa' k'o kuya'o k'axk'olil rumal k'o karaj Dropbox kuq'atuj Bloom ruk' ri rech k'i taq k'olchak. We k'o k'axk'olil, koqxa'nej che chsolob'isaj ri k'i taq uwach pa jun k'olib'al chik o chwesaj q'atum Dropbox ruk' wa' kakoj Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.

trans-unit.source: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.

trans-unit.source: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.

Pacha' ri k'amab'al no'j, rech tailandés, chnima\U0020 rech ub'ixik chech Bloom che pa tailandés koksax uxo'l pacha wi rech uk'isik tz'aqat taq chomanik.
